hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.notepadpp.local

Class AbstractLocalizationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.notepadpp.local.AbstractLocalizationProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocalizationProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalizationProvider, LocalizationProviderBridge

    public abstract class AbstractLocalizationProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILocalizationProvider
    Class serving as a localization provider. It returns the localization specific Strings based on the given key.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    MarkoB
